channel.title: References on INFINI Framework
channel.description: Recent content in References on INFINI Framework

item.title: Makefile Reference
item.description: Makefile Reference # The framework simplifies managing your application by providing reusable commands and variables. Below is an example of how Loadgen utilizes this framework in its Makefile: Use Loadgen for example, here is the project’s Makefile looks like: âžœ loadgen git:(main) cat Makefile SHELL=/bin/bash # APP info APP_NAME := loadgen APP_VERSION := 1.0.0_SNAPSHOT APP_CONFIG := $(APP_NAME).yml $(APP_NAME).dsl APP_EOLDate ?= "2025-12-31T10:10:10Z" APP_STATIC_FOLDER := .public APP_STATIC_PACKAGE := public APP_UI_FOLDER := ui APP_PLUGIN_FOLDER := proxy include .
